name: Cedarview Containment
description:
First ever Godot project. Created in 1 week for my game development class.

You play as a detention monitor who is responsible for ensuring that no kids find their way out of detention.

Cedarview Containment was created as a "workplace game", meant to capture the essential experience of a workplace. Our game is inspired by how detention is often portrayed in the media: kids pranking the detention monitor, wreaking havoc, and trying to escape. We wanted the monitor to feel overwhelmed as they're forced to split their attention between each kid.
